mapper.sql: id, name, seq, description, status, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT e.resource_id AS id FROM t_sys_role r LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_resource e ON r.id = e.role_id WHERE r.id = #{id}
SELECT e.id AS id, s.url AS url FROM t_sys_role r LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_resource e ON r.id = e.role_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_resource s ON e.resource_id = s.id WHERE r.id = #{id}
